description: Dr. Rohit Kaushal is an established, highly qualified urologist with specific training in kidney transplants, robotic surgeries, and uro-oncology. He has experience of more than 8 years of professionalism, wherein he worked with some of the best medical institutions of India under expert, responsible leadership in advancing the management of urology and transplant diseases. His specializations include robotic surgery, laparoscopic procedures, and men's sexual health treatments. To his credit, he has delivered active papers at national as well as international conferences, besides publishing his original work in the most prominent medical journals.

list.content: MNAMS: Member, National Academy of Medical Sciences
Fellowship (Robotics & Kidney Transplant)—Max Saket, New Delhi
Sr. Consultant, Urology, Robotics & Kidney Transplant, Max Healthcare
Sr. Registrar, Urology & Kidney Transplant, ILBS Hospital, New Delhi
Sr. Registrar, Urology, Robotics & Kidney Transplant, Medanta, The Medicity, Gurgaon
Consultant, Urology, Robotics & Kidney Transplant, Fortis Memorial Research Institute, Gurgaon
Several awards received during training years
Oral presentations of research papers, posters, and video presentations at national and international conferences.
Published in the nation's and international premier journals.
Urological Society of India, North Zone (NZ-USI)
Society of Urodynamics and Female Urology (SUFU)
International Association of Sexual Medicine Practitioners of Modern Medicine (IASMPMM)
Society of Endoscopic and Laparoscopic Surgeons of India (SELSI)
Association of Minimal Access Surgeons of India (AMASI)

heading: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Here are some frequently asked questions regarding Dr. Rohit Kaushal's services:

list.name: What conditions does Dr. Kaushal specialize in?
list.content: Dr. Kaushal specializes in urology, kidney transplants, robotic surgeries, and uro-oncology.

list.name: How can I schedule an appointment with Dr. Kaushal?
list.content: To schedule an appointment, please contact Max Healthcare directly or visit their website for online booking options.
